content: squeezebox an overlay mosaic crochet pattern designed by april whited general information technique overlay mosaic squeezebox pattern is ©2023 by april whited do not copy or distribute this terminology us pattern in part or whole in any form of media do not include this pattern in a finished size is up to you this pattern has materials kit or pattern compilation of any repeats of 20 stitches and 20 row repeat kind please support designers by purchasing the width stitches and row to grow your legally project to the size you want please link to the pattern when sharing you can use any size yarn or thread and a your finished or wip projects on social hook size that corresponds to the size yarn media you re using or that you ve found works best for your chosen yarn example shown was permissions you have my permission to made with worsted weight yarn using a sell anything you crochet from my pattern 4 5mm hook however mass production is prohibited squeezebox ©2023 designed by ad whited designs ravelry com or etsy com 1 squeezebox abbreviations a color a r repeat to end of your desired width b under color & row = color b * repeat after last row of instructions to your b under instructions = border base stitch desired length standing single_crochet single_crochet back loop single_crochet r single_crochet b = shown at the end of the row s double_crochet front loop double_crochet 2 row down instruction repeat last stitch single_crochet or double_crochet always the same as the first stitch of the repeat border base stitch start crocheting here color a = background color using color a chain and single_crochet across - single_crochet foundation - cord or i-cord for envelope bordered project work multiples of 20+3 for traditional or fringed edges chain multiples of 20+1 omit border base stitches cut yarn leaving a long tail in case your count is off i put a stitch marker in the last loop and only after row 4 is complete will i fasten_off and trim the yarn down for row 1-3 after creating your single_crochet foundation row move on to row 1 continuing with color a color/ row instructions a 1 single_crochet across b 2 b single_crochet b a 3 b 2dc 3sc 2dc 5sc 2dc 3sc 2dc single_crochet r double_crochet b b 4 b 2sc double_crochet 4sc double_crochet 3sc double_crochet 4sc double_crochet 3sc r single_crochet b a 5 b 3sc 2dc 3sc 3dc 3sc 2dc 4sc r single_crochet b b 6 b 5sc double_crochet 7sc double_crochet 5sc double_crochet r single_crochet b a 7 b 3dc 3sc 2dc x2 3sc 3dc single_crochet r double_crochet b b 8 b 3sc double_crochet 4sc 3dc 4sc double_crochet 3sc double_crochet r single_crochet b squeezebox ©2023 designed by ad whited designs ravelry com or etsy com 2 a 9 b double_crochet 3sc 2dc 7sc 2dc 3sc double_crochet single_crochet r double_crochet b b 10 b single_crochet double_crochet 4sc 2dc 3sc 2dc 4sc double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet r single_crochet b
